detectors.description:

ShieldCureToken.lock(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#175-179) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(locks[_owner] == false) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#176)

ShieldCureToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#143-154) compares to a boolean constant:

ShieldCureToken.unlock(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#181-185) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(locks[_owner] == true) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#182)

ShieldCureToken.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#127-137) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(locks[msg.sender] == false) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8_ShieldCureToken.sol#130)
